result.eng: I eat every type of food.
result.html: Ithim chuile shórt biaI eat every type of food.
result.ponchtml: Iṫim ċuile ẛórt biaI eat every type of food.

result.eng: I don't eat meat. I am a vegetarian.
result.ga: Ní ithim feoil Is feoilséantóir mé
result.orig: Ní ithim feoil Is feoilséantóir mé
result.html: Ní ithim feoil Is feoilséantóir méI don't eat meat. I am a vegetarian.
result.ponchtml: Ní iṫim feoil Is feoilséantóir méI don't eat meat. I am a vegetarian.

result.eng: I eat my dinner between seven and eight.
result.ga: Ithim mo dhinnéar idir a seacht agus a hocht
result.orig: Ithim mo dhinnéar idir a seacht agus a hocht
result.html: Ithim mo dhinnéar idir a seacht agus a hochtI eat my dinner between seven and eight.
result.ponchtml: Iṫim mo ḋinnéar idir a seaċt agus a hoċtI eat my dinner between seven and eight.
